productos.descripcion: Epress SPR (Self-Piercing Rivet) is a fastener used to join metal sheets—especially aluminum—without pre-drilling. Commonly used in automotive applications.
Epress FDS (Flow Drill Screw) is a self-piercing screw that creates its own hole through friction and pressure. Ideal for lightweight materials in automotive applications.
Epress Clinch is a mechanical joining process that forms an interlock between metal sheets without using fasteners or heat. Widely used for lightweight material assembly in the automotive industry.
